item.title: Using IntellijIdea/Pycharm Within An Exisiting Virtualenv
item.description: To add a virtual environment to Intellij IDEA, You have added Python from virtualenv folder to project SDK. Which means that virtualenv directory’s python( for example venv/bin/python2.7) needs to be added to Intellij IDEA project path. Table of contents  For PyCharm >= 2018 For Pycharm 2016 and later For older versions For PyCharm >= 2018 As per documentation from Pycharm:
